post.body: I feel Apple is using app store submissions as idea farming. There's little transparency to prove otherwise.
I saw that... We've lost a bunch of old Tweets from the timeline that would have been nice to reference too.
it's being held hostage along with a lot of actual USEFUL app, by the app store
I want to re-nominate @capnsmackers in #business because your awards are worthless if you'll even rig the nominations
I want to nominate @capnsmackers in #business because you can't plan viral
I like my Mac-Case jacket http://mac-case.com/
good list of people it'd be nice to meet one of these days...
When immediate isn't fast enough. Twitter allows me to track the zeitgeist of NOW not an hour ago.
you mean the antithesis of Godwin's law? Rule 34 is something different...
Thankfully. Ender's Game is a book where the importance of the story would get lost in the visual effects if put to film.
that was Timberlake. Lonely Island and Samberg are single-handedly keeping SNL above water
Our subsidiary LiveTV provides the 36 channels of @DIRECTV and XM Radio (odd, XM channels are on Twitter - but no central org)
responding publicly to every comment without a concise message applicable to many creates a signal/noise issue
I think the role is to provide a responsive, yet responsible level of dialogue
I'd argue that while @JetBlue's PUBLIC feed is utilitarian by design, we remain quite active in the back channel of Twitter.
brand only social network? Sounds like a mall of pamphlet shops and customer service counters. What's in it for the consumer?
I'm alive! The 'other' account has sapped me. Also I hear it helps to have a life to make this Twitter thing interesting
I'm part of the Corporate Communication team and have been interviewed a few times: email morgan.johnston at jetblue.com
leprechaun 3 was as good as the previous in the series... so long as the bar is set low enough...
@shelisrael You can have an 'official' voice while being transparent about who's running it -a tent pole with surrounding support.
for someone nearly INCAPABLE of multi-tasking... I think I did okay today.
Odd that I fly into JFK's T5 before I've ever flown out, considering the number of times I've been here.
Home again, home again, ziggity zig. JetBlue flight 1016 BOS-JFK
Landed at BOS. Wicked.
Airbus bus to Boston... Oh wait, it's an Embaer. JetBlue Flight 434 MCO-BOS
On the ground in Orlando.
Jetting down to Orlando. JetBlue Flight 591 HPN-MCO. I don't see Regis anywhere.
Prepping for four airports in two days. HPN, MCO, BOS, JFK. Woot.
Mmmmm... hotel food.
JetBlue flight 1012 JFK-BOS for a... thing
At The Park with my Corp Comm team
Home from Emmet Otter... a cool show - well done
Headed to see Emmet Otter's Jugband Christmas... The musical
Happy New Year everyone!
Oooo multi-touch trackpad... I suppose Apple has a lot to answer for from multi-finger amputees
It's always important to start out the new year with a new computer
Good question @BrandCustomer. Yes, I think as representative of JetBlue, @JetBlue would be considered official communication.
I'm happy to be transparent about who I am & assoc with @JetBlue but is it the place for the Branded Twitter to engage in the introspection?
"Twitter for Business" analysts often try to engage in meta-conversation with brands reminding me of the self-ref nature of early blogging.
At the movies: "do you want something saltly or sweet?" "Sweet" "I don't want sweet. Do you want something salty?" GAHHHH!
HoHo..etc. You can tell they Twitterers with kids because they're already done for the day. Just waking up here!
Took a tumble on black ice last night... ego bruising isn't nearly as heart-breaking as the damage to my Macbook Pro
She's on a holiday cooking bender. There's no stopping her, only hope hope of containing.
